page.title: 14Religion in Newton Aycliffe
page.content: There have been Christians here for 1300 years.Weekly attendances in 1985 average over 1500 adults,in St.Mary's, St.Joseph (R.C.);St.Clare's,St.Francis St.Elizabeth's(C of E);Neville Parade, Burnhill Way(Methodist);Full Gospel Church(Pentecostal).Other Christians travel to older Churches in nearby towns.As well as nominal Christianity there is interest in lively spiritual living as people seek to find purpose in their lives through the worship and effect of God.Local Christians are deeply involved in the community on social & political levels expressing their Faith through caring for the needy, locally & internationally,& through training people to develop their spirituality in Jesus. Non- Christian religions include Jehovahs Witnesses,Mormons and the Bahai religion.
